import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Create annotations in Graphite format</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/v1/grafana/api/annotations/graphite"}></MethodEndpoint>



Creates an annotation in the Grafana database by using Graphite-compatible event format. <br /> 
*Please ensure to change the region in the URL to match your account's region.*


## Request

<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"what"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Graphite annotation.","example":"Event - deploy"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"when"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Epoch datetime of the annotation in milliseconds. Optional. If `when` is not specified then the current time will be used as annotationâ€™s timestamp.."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"tags"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","description":"Annotation tags.  Can also be in prior to Graphite 0.10.0 format (string with multiple tags being separated by a space).","example":["deploy","production"],"items":{"type":"string"}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"data"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Annotation Description.","example":"deploy of master branch happened at Wed Jul 6 22:34:41 UTC 2016"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

successful query
